thread.section_title: Rentokil Pest Control Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentokil Pest Control Ireland | rentokil.ie
thread.title: Susan
thread.title_full: Rentokil Pest Control Ireland reviewed by Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text: My house got a mouse problem. I contacted the team on Facebook and they responded quickly. They asked me for details to arrange a free survey. The technician is professional, knowledgeable and very friendly. He also recommended what I should and should not do to save my cost. I think they offered a great service.
